title: Punto de Encuentro (2013)
overview: A soldier who is part of a special squad is away from home in the middle of a mission where failure is not an option. He is tested and has to choose to continue or surrender.
storyline: Esteban Ayala, a young soldier who is part of a special squad of the army, are away from home in the middle of a mission where failure is not an option. In an attempt to comply; Esteban is tested and has to choose to continue or surrender.
